name: Breakout (itch) (Andrei2100)
description:
*This game is still in early development*

Breakout is a platformer game in which you must collect keycards in order to escape. To advance to the next level, you must collect the required amount of keycards and then proceed to the exit. A level may contain platforms and doors that you can activate with buttons, as well as traps that can kill you.

Levels:

2

Controls:

Move: A and D

Jump: Spacebar

Pause: Escape

File Size:

164mb

Last Updated: 03/10/2022
